Text: how is the audio sync with this one? the other one i downloaded(AC3-AsA) was off a bit but good quality aside from audio, GOING FOR IT ANYWAY- THANKS FOR THE UP! I'll post my findings when i get through burning&watching
@hotrodder - VLC media player (and probably some others) have adjustable audio delay - you can move it forwards or backwards by up to several seconds to get it in sync
